mapper.select: select r.rid, r.uid, m.name as founder, r.room_name, r.room_password, r.start_time, r.end_time, r.room_state, r.room_type from room r join member m on r.uid = m.uid where r.room_name = #{roomName};
select r.rid, m.uid, m.email, m.name, m.role from room r join entrant e on r.rid = e.rid right join member m on e.uid = m.uid where r.rid = #{rid};

select ev.vid, r.rid, m.uid, m.name, r.room_name, (select m.name from member m where m.uid = r.uid) as founder, ev.eval_date, ev.attention, ev.participation, ev.distracted, ev.asleep, ev.afk, ev.attend_time, ev.ranking from room r join entrant e on r.rid = e.rid right join evaluation ev on e.eid = ev.eid left join member m on e.uid = m.uid where r.rid = #{rid};
